title: Horizon Zero Dawn
about: Experience Aloyâ€™s legendary quest to unravel the mysteries of a world ruled by deadly machines. An epic action RPG where you take on the role of a hunter in a post-apocalyptic world where nature has reclaimed the ruins of civilization.

keyFeatures.title: Machine Combat
keyFeatures.description: Engage in tactical combat against massive, mechanical creatures using various elemental traps and weapons.

keyFeatures.title: A Stunning Open World
keyFeatures.description: Explore lush forests, imposing mountains, and atmospheric ruins.

keyFeatures.title: Mystery of the Past
keyFeatures.description: Uncover the secrets behind the fall of humanity and the rise of the machines.

systemSpecs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
